ComicInfo.Title: Cobra World Order Part Six
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary:
Snake in the Grass! Just when G.I. JOE thinks its safe, COBRA reveals another layer to the Cobra World Order, as a close ally is revealed as a traitor. Can G.I. JOE survive this betrayal?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Stephen Mooney | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Adam Riches | 2 | RE | Great Lakes Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Mike Zeck (a), Jason Moore (i) & Mark McNabb (c) | 3 | RE | Great Lakes Comic Con Exclusive Variant Sketch Cover | Mike Zeck (a) & Jason Moore (i) | 4 |
